page.title: 13FASHION,ANNAN
page.content: Today many boys and girls have punk hairstyles.Their hair is dyed in bright colours .Some have their hair standing on end.This makes their hair look spikey.Others shave parts of their head. Some girls wear long,horrible dresses and long coats.High heeled shoes are in fashion for girls.Tucker boots are in fashion. These are ankle boots.You can get them in different colours.Boys and girls wear jeans.These are usually blue denim trousers.They can be very tight fitting or baggy.Not many teenagers wear nice skirts, or trousers, and jackets. Wearing jewellery is in fashion for boys and girls.You can get them in all shapes and sizes.For example: button earrings _ large round earrings like buttons.You can also get small gold or silver ones called studs.
